pr.title: feat(discover): animated product album in right panel
pr.rollback: Revert PR or revert commit (no DB/RLS changes)

receipt.goal: Replace /discover right-panel results list with Aceternity AnimatedTestimonials-style product album (UI-only)
receipt.decision_notes: Aceternity pattern: AnimatePresence + all items in stack; active card y:[0,-80,0], useReducedMotion(); Lucide ChevronLeft/Right; icon tiles white + #B8432B stroke; no @tabler
